original_title: Gorillaz: Song Machine Live From Kong
overview: The set features songs from the Song Machine project, along with some revered classics from the group’s back catalogue.  The full Gorillaz live band, plus a choice selection of featured artists, showcasing their first live performance since 2018.  This special presentation also features a pre-show programme and exclusive behind-the-scenes footage.
title: Gorillaz: Song Machine Live From Kong
